ingredients.title: For the Chicken
ingredients.list:
300g Chicken meat
1 tbsp vegetable oil, double refined
1 tsp sugar
1 cup water

ingredients.title: For curry and spices
ingredients.list:
2 cup cream, fresh
2 tbsp sugar
2 tbsp cocoa powder
1 tsp vanilla essence
12 strawberries, medium sized
1/2 cup milk cream
